title: Simple Weapons
content: e: When dealing Cold damage, the wielder deals an additional 1 Cold damage. Insidious Cold: Dealing Cold damage with a spell possibly inflicts Chilled upon the target. Nature's Snare 1d6 Bludgeoning(One Handed) 1d8 Bludgeoning(Two Handed) Uncommon 1.5m Versatile ToppleFly Trap Pale Oak 1d6 Bludgeoning(One Handed) 1d8 Bludgeoning(Two Handed) Rare 1.5m Versatile Faithwarden's Stride: Druidic vines cannot Ensnare you and do not count as difficult terrain. Faithwarden's VinesLevel 1 Conjuration Spel
